A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was so long yet nothing happened in terms of plot. If you are a fan\, like me\, you will go see this movie and be extremely disappointed in the direction the film takes. It like the director had never seen Star Wars and gave a middle finger to all the amazing fan theories; all of the theories were better than this film. This is the third worst Star Wars film\, ahead of Episodes One and Two.
